title: Can't figure out how to kick/change rolls of people in my club
body: I have a club but can't do anything to it on the new client except invite people. What the hell Riot?

replies.body: Are you using these features through your club chat or the club interface?  You can locate the interface through the Profile Tab of the client, under the Clubs section.  Let me know if that helps.
This is really not a very intuitive location for club management. I've been searching how to manage clubs, and have only figured it out from this post. Please let your UI team know.
